artist: Artist: Patrick Hughes; Author: Paul Hammond; Publisher: Coriander Studio, London
creditline: Gift of funds from Emily Mason and Wolf Kahn
description: a folio in 3 parts, contained in a cardboard box; Part I- hand colored screenprint of a rainbow; Part 2- six screenprints; Part 3- Upon the Pun: Dual Meaning in Words and Pictures, by Paul Hammond and Patrick Hughes, book, London, W.H.Allen, A. Howard & Wyndham Co., 1978; with 2 aquatints (P.80.77. P.80.78)
medium: Screenprints printed in white on black paper
portfolio: From The Domestic Life of the Rainbow
provenance: Martin S. Ackerman Foundation, New York (agent); given to MIA, 1980.
title: Frontispiece and colophon for "The Domestic Life of a Rainbow" Folio
